data.text:
『It can't be anyone else but me』, you say…… 
but, why do you think that about me……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>『It can't be anyone else but me』, you say…… 
<story>but, why do you think that about me……?

data.text:
『It can't be anyone else but me』, you say…… 
but, why do you think that about me……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>『It can't be anyone else but me』, you say…… 
<story>but, why do you think that about me……?

data.text: ……The truth is, we already knew about you before we enrolled here.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>……The truth is, we already knew about you before we enrolled here.

data.text:
……that you were following in the footsteps of your 
『Famous』 father by becoming the trainer of Team <Ascella>.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……that you were following in the footsteps of your 
<story>『Famous』 father by becoming the trainer of Team <Ascella>.

data.text:
(Honestly――I wasn't surprised that they knew. 
After all, it was quite the news story at the time.)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Honestly――I wasn't surprised that they knew. 
<story>After all, it was quite the news story at the time.)

data.text:
As someone who possessed a keen intuition in regards to 
Uma Musume, able to guide them skillfully, my father became 
『Famous』 as someone who raised many strong Uma Musume.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>As someone who possessed a keen intuition in regards to 
<story>Uma Musume, able to guide them skillfully, my father became 
<story>『Famous』 as someone who raised many strong Uma Musume.

data.text:
He became a leading trainer at a young age. 
He has now decided to retire and going forward…… 
I will be taking over his team, <Ascella>.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>He became a leading trainer at a young age. 
<story>He has now decided to retire and going forward…… 
<story>I will be taking over his team, <Ascella>.

data.text:
He became a leading trainer at a young age. 
He has now decided to retire and going forward…… 
I will be taking over his team, <Ascella>.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>He became a leading trainer at a young age. 
<story>He has now decided to retire and going forward…… 
<story>I will be taking over his team, <Ascella>.

data.text:
Obviously, it attracted alot of attention. After that, I 
formed a contract with King Halo, whose mother was also 
famous. It had earned us the nickname 『Second Generation Duo』.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Obviously, it attracted alot of attention. After that, I 
<story>formed a contract with King Halo, whose mother was also 
<story>famous. It had earned us the nickname 『Second Generation Duo』.

data.text:
On remaining undefeated and winning your first 
major race, congratulations! After this, are your 
plans to enter the Classic Triple Crown rotation!?
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>On remaining undefeated and winning your first 
<story>major race, congratulations! After this, are your 
<story>plans to enter the Classic Triple Crown rotation!?

data.text:
Yes, of course! The 『Satsuki Sho』『Japan Derby』 and 『Kikka Sho』, 
I will, without fail win the Triple Crown races――
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Yes, of course! The 『Satsuki Sho』『Japan Derby』 and 『Kikka Sho』, 
<story>I will, without fail win the Triple Crown races――

data.text:
Without fail, I will show you results befitting of 
being called first rate. Please, look forward to it!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Without fail, I will show you results befitting of 
<story>being called first rate. Please, look forward to it!

data.text:
For next year's Classic Triple Crown, Special Week, 
who is being led by the New Age 『Genius』 trainer, 
has also announced their participation!
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>For next year's Classic Triple Crown, Special Week, 
<story>who is being led by the New Age 『Genius』 trainer, 
<story>has also announced their participation!

data.text:
Many people seem to think that Team <Ascella> and the 『Genius』 
team are rivals, are you confident that you can win!?
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>Many people seem to think that Team <Ascella> and the 『Genius』 
<story>team are rivals, are you confident that you can win!?

data.text:
This is not a battle between trainers, it is a battle between 
Uma Musume, and I'd like you to keep that in mind, however――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>This is not a battle between trainers, it is a battle between 
<story>Uma Musume, and I'd like you to keep that in mind, however――

data.text:
Of course I have confidence. ……that is a reflection of 
the trust I put in King Halo, a first rate Uma Musume.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Of course I have confidence. ……that is a reflection of 
<story>the trust I put in King Halo, a first rate Uma Musume.

data.text:
As expected……! We're looking forward to the continued 
success of the 『Second Generation Duo』, following in 
the footsteps of their renowned parents.
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>As expected……! We're looking forward to the continued 
<story>success of the 『Second Generation Duo』, following in 
<story>the footsteps of their renowned parents.

data.text: But……
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>But……

data.text: ……it's finally the 『Japan Derby』 isn't it……?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>……it's finally the 『Japan Derby』 isn't it……?

data.text:
(Not good……King looks really uneasy……I wanted to give her some 
advice so she could be more confident and positive……but……!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Not good……King looks really uneasy……I wanted to give her some 
<story>advice so she could be more confident and positive……but……!)

data.text:
(Not good……King looks really uneasy……I wanted to give her some 
advice so she could be more confident and positive……but……!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Not good……King looks really uneasy……I wanted to give her some 
<story>advice so she could be more confident and positive……but……!)

data.text:
(Honestly……I'm not sure what to tell her! 
At Satsuki, Seiun Sky got us good, so I want 
her to be cautious of the front but――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Honestly……I'm not sure what to tell her! 
<story>At Satsuki, Seiun Sky got us good, so I want 
<story>her to be cautious of the front but――)

data.text:
(Honestly……I'm not sure what to tell her! 
At Satsuki, Seiun Sky got us good, so I want 
her to be cautious of the front but――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Honestly……I'm not sure what to tell her! 
<story>At Satsuki, Seiun Sky got us good, so I want 
<story>her to be cautious of the front but――)

data.text:
(There's also Special Week from behind too! If she 
focused too much on the front, she'd exhaust herself 
before the end and it would be all over……!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(There's also Special Week from behind too! If she 
<story>focused too much on the front, she'd exhaust herself 
<story>before the end and it would be all over……!)

data.text:
(So then what should I do? What should I say? What position 
should she take, who should she mark, how should she run……!?)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(So then what should I do? What should I say? What position 
<story>should she take, who should she mark, how should she run……!?)

data.text:
(So then what should I do? What should I say? What position 
should she take, who should she mark, how should she run……!?)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(So then what should I do? What should I say? What position 
<story>should she take, who should she mark, how should she run……!?)

data.text:
(Damnit, damnit, damnit! Why can't I 
think of anything!? Even though I'm……!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Damnit, damnit, damnit! Why can't I 
<story>think of anything!? Even though I'm……!)

data.text:
(Damnit, damnit, damnit! Why can't I 
think of anything!? Even though I'm……!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Damnit, damnit, damnit! Why can't I 
<story>think of anything!? Even though I'm……!)

data.text:
W-wait……what's wrong? 
Don't make a face like that right before……Hey――!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>W-wait……what's wrong? 
<story>Don't make a face like that right before……Hey――!

data.text:
――Excuse me. 
King Halo-san, it's time. Please make your way to the paddock.
data.name: Race Official
data.processed:
<story>――Excuse me. 
<story>King Halo-san, it's time. Please make your way to the paddock.

data.text:
Ah…… 
……I need to get going……
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Ah…… 
<story>……I need to get going……

data.text: (I'm out of time……! I wasn't……able to say anything……!!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>(I'm out of time……! I wasn't……able to say anything……!!)

data.text: (I'm out of time……! I wasn't……able to say anything……!!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>(I'm out of time……! I wasn't……able to say anything……!!)

data.text:
Now, the 『Japan Derby』 finally――starts!! 
18 Uma Musume run for their dreams, for that crown!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Now, the 『Japan Derby』 finally――starts!! 
<story>18 Uma Musume run for their dreams, for that crown!

data.text:
(I need to win, I need to win, I need to win! 
I need to win, I…… ……!?)
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>(I need to win, I need to win, I need to win! 
<story>I need to win, I…… ……!?)

data.text: Aaaaaaaaah!!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>Aaaaaaaaah!!

data.text:
(Ah……eh……? Front? 
W-what am I doing here……?)
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>(Ah……eh……? Front? 
<story>W-what am I doing here……?)

data.text: (No way……my mind……just went blank……!?)
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>(No way……my mind……just went blank……!?)

data.text:
……!! 
Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa――!!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……!! 
<story>Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa――!!

data.text:
It's Special Week! It's Special Week! She pulls far 
away from them all, Special Week crosses the goal!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>It's Special Week! It's Special Week! She pulls far 
<story>away from them all, Special Week crosses the goal!!

data.text:
The prestige of the 『Japan Derby』! 
In this 『Japan Derby』, Special Week has claimed victory!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The prestige of the 『Japan Derby』! 
<story>In this 『Japan Derby』, Special Week has claimed victory!!

data.text:
――She was the second favorite, but King Halo was defeated 
back in to 14th place! It's the first time she's run as an 
escape since her debut, but the results were unfortunate!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>――She was the second favorite, but King Halo was defeated 
<story>back in to 14th place! It's the first time she's run as an 
<story>escape since her debut, but the results were unfortunate!

data.text: Haa……Haaaa……~~~!!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>Haa……Haaaa……~~~!!

data.text:
Hey, hey, hey! What is the 『Second Generation Duo』 doing!? 
They just got crushed by that 『Genius Trainer』's team!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>Hey, hey, hey! What is the 『Second Generation Duo』 doing!? 
<story>They just got crushed by that 『Genius Trainer』's team!

data.text:
And……why did she run as an escape? Did she panic? 
Or was it her trainer's orders? Either way, it wasn't great.
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
<story>And……why did she run as an escape? Did she panic? 
<story>Or was it her trainer's orders? Either way, it wasn't great.

data.text: In the end, second gen was just second rate, huh.
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed: <story>In the end, second gen was just second rate, huh.

data.text:
(After that, we lost two more major races, 
including the 『Kikka Sho』. Her classic year 
ended with us not living up to expectations――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(After that, we lost two more major races, 
<story>including the 『Kikka Sho』. Her classic year 
<story>ended with us not living up to expectations――)

data.text:
(After that, we lost two more major races, 
including the 『Kikka Sho』. Her classic year 
ended with us not living up to expectations――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(After that, we lost two more major races, 
<story>including the 『Kikka Sho』. Her classic year 
<story>ended with us not living up to expectations――)

data.text:
……Looks like there's no articles about Team <Ascella> 
today either. Well, even if there were, all the 
latest articles have been disparaging us though.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……Looks like there's no articles about Team <Ascella> 
<story>today either. Well, even if there were, all the 
<story>latest articles have been disparaging us though.

data.text:
……I suppose that just means the world has finally 
lost interest in the Unreliable Second Gen Duo……
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……I suppose that just means the world has finally 
<story>lost interest in the Unreliable Second Gen Duo……

data.text:
(I was pathetic. I just wanted to disappear. Due to my 
incompetence, King's once-in-a-lifetime Classic year……)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(I was pathetic. I just wanted to disappear. Due to my 
<story>incompetence, King's once-in-a-lifetime Classic year……)

data.text:
(I was pathetic. I just wanted to disappear. Due to my 
incompetence, King's once-in-a-lifetime Classic year……)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(I was pathetic. I just wanted to disappear. Due to my 
<story>incompetence, King's once-in-a-lifetime Classic year……)

data.text:
(Don't just apologize. Don't let go. ……Don't run from it! 
I am King Halo's trainer!)
data.name: <username>

choices.text: (Which means, there's still more to do!)
choices.processed: <size=42>(Which means, there's still more to do!)</size>

choices.text: (Which means, there's still more to do!)
choices.processed: <size=42>(Which means, there's still more to do!)</size>

data.processed:
<story>(Don't just apologize. Don't let go. ……Don't run from it! 
<story>I am King Halo's trainer!)

data.text:
(Don't just apologize. Don't let go. ……Don't run from it! 
I am King Halo's trainer!)
data.name: <username>

choices.text: (Which means, there's still more to do!)
choices.processed: <size=42>(Which means, there's still more to do!)</size>

choices.text: (Which means, there's still more to do!)
choices.processed: <size=42>(Which means, there's still more to do!)</size>

data.processed:
<story>(Don't just apologize. Don't let go. ……Don't run from it! 
<story>I am King Halo's trainer!)

data.text:
King. ……for your next race, how does the 『Yasuda Kinen』 sound? 
I want to utilize your best weapon, your speed.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>King. ……for your next race, how does the 『Yasuda Kinen』 sound? 
<story>I want to utilize your best weapon, your speed.

data.text:
King. ……for your next race, how does the 『Yasuda Kinen』 sound? 
I want to utilize your best weapon, your speed.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>King. ……for your next race, how does the 『Yasuda Kinen』 sound? 
<story>I want to utilize your best weapon, your speed.

data.text: By next…… You mean――
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>By next…… You mean――

data.text:
I know it hurts. Honestly it must feel awful. 
……But you, even then, you aren't an Uma Musume 
who will give up so easily, right?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I know it hurts. Honestly it must feel awful. 
<story>……But you, even then, you aren't an Uma Musume 
<story>who will give up so easily, right?

data.text:
I know it hurts. Honestly it must feel awful. 
……But you, even then, you aren't an Uma Musume 
who will give up so easily, right?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I know it hurts. Honestly it must feel awful. 
<story>……But you, even then, you aren't an Uma Musume 
<story>who will give up so easily, right?

data.text:
Even if someone looks at you with disappointment, even if 
they tell you it's impossible. Never, not until the day you 
can hold your head up high as a 『First Rate Uma Musume』!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Even if someone looks at you with disappointment, even if 
<story>they tell you it's impossible. Never, not until the day you 
<story>can hold your head up high as a 『First Rate Uma Musume』!

data.text:
Even if someone looks at you with disappointment, even if 
they tell you it's impossible. Never, not until the day you 
can hold your head up high as a 『First Rate Uma Musume』!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Even if someone looks at you with disappointment, even if 
<story>they tell you it's impossible. Never, not until the day you 
<story>can hold your head up high as a 『First Rate Uma Musume』!

data.text:
……~~~, isn't that obvious!? 
The thought of giving up, of it ending like this, I hate it!!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……~~~, isn't that obvious!? 
<story>The thought of giving up, of it ending like this, I hate it!!

data.text:
So start preparing, Trainer! We're having a meeting 
about the next race! Just for you――I'll give you the 
privilege of supporting King's new path!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>So start preparing, Trainer! We're having a meeting 
<story>about the next race! Just for you――I'll give you the 
<story>privilege of supporting King's new path!

data.text:
From then on, we continued on. Even when they 
pointed and laughed at us, we kept running forward.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>From then on, we continued on. Even when they 
<story>pointed and laughed at us, we kept running forward.

data.text:
『Yasuda Kinen』『Takarazuka Kinen』『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』 
『Mile CS』『Sprinter's S』『February S』……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>『Yasuda Kinen』『Takarazuka Kinen』『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』 
<story>『Mile CS』『Sprinter's S』『February S』……

data.text:
We lost, tried again, and lost again. Just hanging 
on desperately. On the grandest stage. G1 Races. 
Everything for the sake of winning there.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>We lost, tried again, and lost again. Just hanging 
<story>on desperately. On the grandest stage. G1 Races. 
<story>Everything for the sake of winning there.

data.text:
She comes flying from the outside, King Halo! 
It's King Halo! King Halo breezes past them all!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>She comes flying from the outside, King Halo! 
<story>It's King Halo! King Halo breezes past them all!!

data.text:
First place is King Halo! Overcoming 10 defeats, now, at the 
『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』 King Halo obtains her first G1 victory!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>First place is King Halo! Overcoming 10 defeats, now, at the 
<story>『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』 King Halo obtains her first G1 victory!!

data.text: Uu……Uwaaaaaaaaaaah!!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>Uu……Uwaaaaaaaaaaah!!

data.text:
(King Halo lets out a yell. That brilliance is 
just proof that she's a first rate Uma Musume. 
There was nobody who could doubt that now!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(King Halo lets out a yell. That brilliance is 
<story>just proof that she's a first rate Uma Musume. 
<story>There was nobody who could doubt that now!)

data.text:
――……I'm thankful for the many words of congratulations. 
To be honest, it hasn't been an easy road but……
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>――……I'm thankful for the many words of congratulations. 
<story>To be honest, it hasn't been an easy road but……

data.text:
To be able to continue running, without giving up……! 
Has made……me incredibly happy……!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>To be able to continue running, without giving up……! 
<story>Has made……me incredibly happy……!

data.text:
(Afterwards……when we watched the broadcast, King 
and I both argued 『No, you were crying harder』)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Afterwards……when we watched the broadcast, King 
<story>and I both argued 『No, you were crying harder』)

data.text:
――……it was powerful, and moved me. 
During that press conference, both of you……looked so strong.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>――……it was powerful, and moved me. 
<story>During that press conference, both of you……looked so strong.

data.text:
Fufuu. ……Actually, both of us were watching 
that press conference on the street billboards! 
And we happened to be next to each other!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu. ……Actually, both of us were watching 
<story>that press conference on the street billboards! 
<story>And we happened to be next to each other!

data.text:
That's where me and Cesario had both decided. That someday, 
we'd definitely join King-san and Trainer-san's team.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>That's where me and Cesario had both decided. That someday, 
<story>we'd definitely join King-san and Trainer-san's team.

data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>To never give up on your dream until the very 
<story>end. No matter how painful, or frustrating, 
<story>to keep running until you've taken hold of it.

data.text:
To stay on that journey together. Working together 
to carve open a path. Seeing the two of you like 
that……I admired you from the bottom of my heart.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>To stay on that journey together. Working together 
<story>to carve open a path. Seeing the two of you like 
<story>that……I admired you from the bottom of my heart.

data.text:
……that's why Kraft and I chose Team <Ascella>. 
There is no better team for us, is what we believe.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……that's why Kraft and I chose Team <Ascella>. 
<story>There is no better team for us, is what we believe.

data.text:
That if Trainer-san is with us, then we can keep going, 
never giving up. Until we take hold of our dreams, no 
matter how painful it is, we can keep running……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>That if Trainer-san is with us, then we can keep going, 
<story>never giving up. Until we take hold of our dreams, no 
<story>matter how painful it is, we can keep running……!

data.text:
……geez, I was wondering what you were talking about. 
And you, you should be more proud of yourself too.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……geez, I was wondering what you were talking about. 
<story>And you, you should be more proud of yourself too.

data.text:
……even though we were thrown off the path we 
were expected to take, that we had prepared for!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……even though we were thrown off the path we 
<story>were expected to take, that we had prepared for!

data.text:
Even if we weren't able to leave the results expected of the 
children of a famous Uma Musume and a famous trainer.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Even if we weren't able to leave the results expected of the 
<story>children of a famous Uma Musume and a famous trainer.

data.text:
Even if we weren't able to leave the results expected of the 
children of a famous Uma Musume and a famous trainer.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Even if we weren't able to leave the results expected of the 
<story>children of a famous Uma Musume and a famous trainer.

data.text:
That we were able to do something so like us――that only 
we could do, being able to obtain a first rate result. 
Just who else do you think this was thanks to?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>That we were able to do something so like us――that only 
<story>we could do, being able to obtain a first rate result. 
<story>Just who else do you think this was thanks to?

data.text:
The reason I was able to hold my head high and keep running…… 
just who was it that stuck by my side and made it possible?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>The reason I was able to hold my head high and keep running…… 
<story>just who was it that stuck by my side and made it possible?

data.text:
――I'm pathetic. I gave King Halo a bitter smile, 
and turned back to Rhein Kraft and Cesario.
data.processed:
<story>――I'm pathetic. I gave King Halo a bitter smile, 
<story>and turned back to Rhein Kraft and Cesario.

data.text:
Kraft, Cesario. 
……I'm really thankful that you chose Team <Ascella>.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Kraft, Cesario. 
<story>……I'm really thankful that you chose Team <Ascella>.

data.text:
I'm not as great as my dad. 
I may only have inherited his stubbornness. But still――
data.name: <username>

choices.text: I'll support you until the end
I'll support you until the end

data.processed:
<story>I'm not as great as my dad. 
<story>I may only have inherited his stubbornness. But still――

data.text:
I'm not as great as my dad.
